mapper.insert: insert into tbl_msg (mno, send_nick, recv_nick, content, room, profile, read_chk, wno) values( msg_seq.nextval, #{send_nick}, #{recv_nick}, #{content}, #{room}, #{profile}, 0, #{wno} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_msg where room = #{room}

select m.mno, m.send_nick, m.recv_nick, m.content, m.send_time, m.read_time, m.room, m.read_chk, m.profile, m.wno, g.wtitle, g.departure, g.arrive, g.city from tbl_msg m left join tbl_goWith g on g.wno = m.wno where mno in (select max(mno) from tbl_msg group by room) and (send_nick = #{nick} or recv_nick=#{nick}) order by mno desc

select m.mno, m.room, m.send_nick, m.recv_nick, m.send_time, m.read_time, m.content, m.read_chk, m.profile from tbl_msg m left outer join tbl_user u on m.send_nick = u.user_nick and m.profile = u.user_pic
where room = #{room} order by mno asc
where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick = #{nick} or (send_nick = #{recv_nick} and recv_nick = #{nick}))
